      Methods in simula.runtime that return RTObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RTObject RTObject.call(RTObject obj)
      Call causes the active phase of a QPS component to be used as a procedure.
      RTObject RTObject.resume(RTObject obj)
      Resume is performed in three principal stages: A reactivation point is set for the currently operating component.
      Methods in simula.runtime with parameters of type RTObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RTObject RTObject.call(RTObject obj)
      Call causes the active phase of a QPS component to be used as a procedure.
      RTObject RTObject.resume(RTObject obj)
      Resume is performed in three principal stages: A reactivation point is set for the currently operating component.
